edu.frontrange.csc240.a4.example3

Class Craps

  • Object
    • edu.frontrange.csc240.a4.example3.Craps

  • public class Craps
extends Object
    This class definition is based on Figure 6.8: Craps.java (Craps class simulates the dice game craps) of the Edition 10 textbook, as modified by Exercise 6.33.

    It has been modified to make the flow of play more obvious, and to document the code in a more usual Java style.

    Version:
    1.0, 2016-08-22, CSC-240 Assignment 4, Sample
    Author:
    Deitel & Associates (see copyright notice at end), Dr. Bruce K. Haddon, Instructor

      private static class  Craps.Status
      Enum type with constants that represent the game status

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int ACE_DEUCE
      Constant that represent a common roll of the dice (one dice 1, the other is 2)
      private static double BALANCE_UP_BIG
      Definition of "up big" for the bank balance.
      private double bankBalance
      The bank balance for the player of this game.
      private static int BOX_CARS
      Constant that represent a common roll of the dice (both dice are 6)
      private double initialBankBalance
      The initial bank balance for the player of this game
      private java.util.Scanner input
      The Scanner from which to accept input.
      private static int PER_CENT
      Definition of per cent.
      private static int PERCENT_DISCOURAGING_CHATTER
      Frequency to break in with discouraging chatter.
      private static int PERCENT_ENCOURAGING_CHATTER
      Frequency to break in with encouraging chatter.
      private static java.util.Random RANDOM
      Random number generator for use in method rollDice
      private static int SEVEN
      Constant that represent a common roll of the dice (the sum of the dice is 7)
      private static int SNAKE_EYES
      Constant that represent a common roll of the dice (each dice is one)
      private static int YO_LEVEN
      Constant that represent a common roll of the dice (one dice 5, the other is 6)

      • rollDice

        public static int rollDice()
        Simulate the rolls of two dice, and return the sum of the rolls. The outcome of the rolls is reported on System.out.
        Returns:
        the sum of two dice rolls
